21830.「……よし。\n これで 歴史書の汚れが消え 続きが読める。\n いったい 何が:
Good... Now that the history book has been
cleaned, we can see what the rest says.
What could have possibly been written...

21833.「やはり 恐れていた通りだ……。\n 大変なことが わかってしまった……。:
It's just as I feared...
And we found out the hard way, no less...

21834.「すぐに 騎士団員たちを集め 報告せねば！\n <pc>さんも 同席してください:
I must gather the cavalry and report this
immediately! I request that you come as
well!

21835.「……ドゥラくん！！\n 大変なことが わかったって なに！？:
Dura!! What's this about finding something
terrible?!

21837.「ど どうして だまってるの？\n いったい その本に 何が書かれていたのさ！？:
W...what are you just standing there for?
What did you find in that book?!

21839.「私は クァバルナの死に際の言葉が 気にかかり\n この歴史書で やつのことを調:
That demon's dying words intrigued me, so
I looked up more about him in this book.

21840.「この書物の名は 天魔黙示録……。:
The book is called The
Kukulkannibapocalypse...

21841.「かつて 天魔クァバルナに\n 苦しめられた民が 多くの犠牲を払い\n やつのこ:
It is a history book written by those who were
once tormented by Kukulkannibal. They paid
many sacrifices to investigate his existence.

21842.「そんな…… <pc>さんが倒した\n あの クァバルナが また……。\n いっ:
No way.... That demon that <pc>
defeated is back...? What are we going
to do...?

21843.「私もまだ この歴史書の すべてに\n 目を通したわけではないので\n くわしい:
I've not read through all of the book, so I
don't know all of the details just yet...

21844.「対応策は 必ず あるはずです。\n この命に代えて 私が 見つけてみせますから:
There must be some way we can avert this
crisis. I promise to find it, even if my life
is at stake. For now, just prepare yourself.

21845.「騎士団員たちは 動揺することなく\n ラミザ王子を しっかり お守りするように:
Our cavalry will ensure Prince Ramiza's
safety! Once our plan is in motion, I will
report back!

21846.「無論 本件は 他言無用である！\n 極秘事項につき 情報の扱いには気をつけよ！:
And of course, you are not to tell a soul
about this! This information is top secret!
That is all!

21847.「ありがとうございました <pc>さん。\n あなたの手を借り クァバルナ復活の:
Thanks for your help, . Amidst everything that's been discovered, it is quite fortunate that your assistance was able to
uncover Kukulkannibal's revival early.

21848.「……ドルワームは ふたたび\n あなたを 必要としているようです。: It seems Dolworm needs your help once again...

21849.「あなたは クァバルナを葬った勇士。\n どうか その剛腕を 今一度\n ドルワ:
You are the brave one who buried
Kukulkannibal once before. Please lend
Dolworm your strength once more!
